com.fxgraph.graph

Class PannableCanvas.DragContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fxgraph.graph.PannableCanvas.DragContext
  • Enclosing class:
    PannableCanvas

    public static class PannableCanvas.DragContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Mouse drag context used for scene and nodes. A drag is defined by a start point (anchor) and an offset from that start point (translate anchor, end point). The translate anchor can change until the drag is complete.
